mapper.insert: insert into user_passenger (user_id, passenger_id, passenger_phonenumber) values (#{userId},#{passengerId}, #{phonenumber})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS id, p.name AS name, p.id_number AS idNumber, up.passenger_phonenumber AS phoneNumber FROM passenger p JOIN user_passenger up ON p.id = up.passenger_id WHERE up.user_id = #{id} ORDER BY p.id DESC
